Summary: Defined upside down cone shape-with a bright light shining down from it.
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my husband were outside tonight and a cone shaped form appeared it shone a bright light down from it. The sides of the v were bright and defined. It stayed in the sky for about 10 seconds and started to fade to a smokey cloud which stayed in the sky for about 10 more seconds. We both said to each other what is it.
